attributes.action: Require continued wearing of face coverings in shops, public transport etc
attributes.additional_details: There are still many young people who have not had a second vaccine and many more immunosuppressed people who will be exposed to increased risk if people chose not to wear masks. Wait until we can see the reduction in new infections. Wearing a mask is primarily to protect others - individuals will see the choice as a personal one rather than a wider public act.
attributes.background: Do not change the mask wearing legislation on July 19th - require the continued wearing of masks in settings where social distancing is not possible.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616
 
Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694

Keep mandatory face coverings in supermarkets and on public transport: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590836
